Class: Aeroplane

Aeroplane(name, seats, type, maxWeight)

represents a aeroplane that can travel from port to port

Constructor

new Aeroplane(name, seats, type, maxWeight)

Creates a new Aeroplane
Parameters:
Name Type Description
name String the name of the plane
seats Number the number of seats the plane has
type String a string of the type of plane
maxWeight Number the maximum weight that can be held by this plane
